form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 Form Approved. DEPARTMENT OF STATE Budget Bureau No. 47-R150.2. FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION STRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa if $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be ground for your prosecution and/or deportation. I hereby apply for an immigrant visa and alien registration at the United States Consulate General at Bombay, India and state the following facts: 1. My family name is My first name is DESAI BRABHAVANTI My middle name is GULABSHANKER 2. My full name in native alphabet (If other than Roman letters are used) is Hall am 0) u G2132EZ145 3. Other names I have used or by which I have been known are (If married woman, give maiden name) MANIBEN 4. The date of my birth is 5. My place of birth is (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 4TH MAY 1887 JUNAGADH GUJERAT INDIA 6. My age is 80 years 7. My present calling or occupation is NIL 2 8. My present address is C/o. B.G. DESAI 370, BHANDARKER ROAD, MATUNGA, BOMBAY-19-DD. 9. My sex is 10. My marital status is Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Including my present marriage, I have been married ONCE Male Female times. 11. My nationality is INDIAN 12. My personal description is 13. I have the following visible marks of identification (a) Color of hair WHITE (c) Height 4 MOLE ON BOTH CHEEKS. feet 10 inches (b) Color of eyes BLACK (d) Complexion FAIR 14. My purpose in going to the United States is JOINING MY SONS FAMILY- 15. I intend to remain in the United States permanently or (Give length of 16. I intend to enter the United States at the port of time) INDEFINITELY. LOS ANGELES 17. I (Do) (Do Not) have a ticket to my final destination I DO HAVE A TICKET. 18. (a) I am going to the United States to join the following person (Give name 18. (b) I am sponsored by the following person and/or organization (Give and address and relationship, if any) SON. address if different from (a)) DR. R.G. DESAI, CHIEF OF HEMATOLOGY, DR. R.G. DESAI, Same as 18 (a) ORANGE COUNTY GENERAL HOSPITAL, 101,ORANGE, MANCHESTER, AVENUE, CALIFORNIA, U.S.A. 19. My final address in the United States is Same as above. 20. My personal financial resources are (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits (d) Other THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
